name: Cryptocurrency Clicker (itch)
description:
This is my first game published on internet

Welcome to Cryptocurrency Clicker! In this game you have to click Big Coin to get more CryptoCoins. You can sell CryptoCoins for visable amount of money (on sell button). Exchange changes sometimes and it can go up or down.

 If you have any suggestions, please write comments.

I hope you'll enjoy playing mine game!
